subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Starter Wei-Yin Chen held New York’s offense in check, and closer Jim Johnson rebounded after blowing Game 1 to shut down the Yankees, who failed to produce behind Andy Pettitte.
snippet: Starter Wei-Yin Chen held New York’s offense in check, and closer Jim Johnson rebounded after blowing Game 1 to shut down the Yankees, who failed to produce behind Andy Pettitte.
